name: Knight Z
description:
My first project in Unity, a 2D Top-down Shooter focused around surviving waves of zombies infused with mana. Fight through a seemingly endless source of enemies, injecting yourself with the very strain that turned them to control their power. But, manage your usage and stay calm - otherwise you might join them.

This game is currently in Beta, with a couple bugs and glitches that can effect gameplay. Most of the game is incomplete and so the gameplay might reflect on this since its the very first time I've had experience in and with Unity - especially with time constraints.
